name: Police Escape Demo
description:
Police escape is a game made for ludum dare 41.

The game genres is: Top down + side scroller platform +2d+3d.

Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

You control a police officer named Roger Robson, in which he was doing his prison shift when he is surprised by a message telling him to escape the prison, the whole jail was taken by the inmates and his purpose is to escape from there as if he were an inmate , armed only with his baton Roger Robson needs to achieve freedom and thus call for reinforcements and take prison power back.
